about.title: About me
about.introduction: Hello, stranger! My name is Gino Varela and I was born in Chile. I studied and obtained my Higher Technical Certificate in Web Application Development in Spain. Exploring the hidden mechanisms behind websites and applications has always fascinated me—how everything runs smoothly in the background. I'd say that my hobby is the same as my occupation - that is to develop web applications.
